data.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Price Fall Offers ‘Attractive' Entry, Says Tom Lee, Predicts BTC ATH Next Month
data.description: Fundstrat’s Tom Lee and Mark Newton remain bullish on Bitcoin and Ethereum despite recent sharp declines. Ethereum and Bitcoin face near-term volatility. Both analysts still ...
